item.title: About Me
item.description: Exploring solutions in tech, climate, and culture I’m a Design Technologist in Mozilla’s Innovation Organization, focused on humans’ relationship to technology and the natural world. My goal is to contribute to impactful solutions that address the climate crisis in ways that foster a healthier relationship between our devices, our surroundings, and each other. This site serves as a way to document and share that progress with others. While this blog represents the key things I’m focused on right now, you can find my portfolio website at mikeheavers.
